projects.title: Azure Pet Store
projects.description: Get up and running within minutes. Just install the starter, add your content, deploy it, and there you go! This starter works seamlessly with hosts like Netlify. Photo by Clément H on Unsplash.

projects.title: Serverless Resume Application
projects.description: Get up and running within minutes. Just install the starter, add your content, deploy it, and there you go! This starter works seamlessly with hosts like Netlify. Photo by Clément H on Unsplash.

projects.title: Portfolio Website
projects.description: This is the website you are on right now. It's an online portfolio made with Gatsby, GitHub and Azure Static Web Apps. It makes use of CI/CD using GitHub Actions to automatically build and deploy after each commit.
